text: Tomara ki dekha na, niscaya allah asamanasamuha o yamine ya kichu ache sabakichu'i tomadera kalyane niyojita karechena ebam tomadera prati tamra prakasya o aprakasya anugraha sampurna karechena [1]? Ara manusera madhye ke'u ke'u kono jnana, kono pathanirdesa ba kono diptimana kitaba chara'i allah sambandhe bitanda kare
